title: Pset_SpaceThermalDesign
description: Space or zone HVAC design requirements. HISTORY: New property set in IFC Release 1.0 (Pset_SpaceHvacInformation); renamed to Pset_SpaceThermalDesign and revised in IFC2x2.

CoolingDesignAirflow.title: CoolingDesignAirflow
CoolingDesignAirflow.description: The air flowrate required during the peak cooling conditions.

HeatingDesignAirflow.title: HeatingDesignAirflow
HeatingDesignAirflow.description: The air flowrate required during the peak heating conditions, but could also be determined by minimum ventilation requirement or minimum air change requirements.

TotalSensibleHeatGain.title: TotalSensibleHeatGain
TotalSensibleHeatGain.description: The total sensible heat or energy gained by the space during the peak cooling conditions.

TotalHeatGain.title: TotalHeatGain
TotalHeatGain.description: The total amount of heat or energy gained by the space at the time of the space's peak cooling conditions.

TotalHeatLoss.title: TotalHeatLoss
TotalHeatLoss.description: The total amount of heat or energy lost by the space at the time of the space's peak heating conditions.

CoolingDryBulb.title: CoolingDryBulb
CoolingDryBulb.description: Inside dry bulb temperature for cooling design.

CoolingRelativeHumidity.title: CoolingRelativeHumidity
CoolingRelativeHumidity.description: Inside relative humidity for cooling design.

HeatingDryBulb.title: HeatingDryBulb
HeatingDryBulb.description: Inside dry bulb temperature for heating design.

HeatingRelativeHumidity.title: HeatingRelativeHumidity
HeatingRelativeHumidity.description: Inside relative humidity for heating design.

VentilationAirFlowrate.title: VentilationAirFlowrate
VentilationAirFlowrate.description: Ventilation outside air requirement for the space.

ExhaustAirFlowrate.title: ExhaustAirFlowrate
ExhaustAirFlowrate.description: Design exhaust air flow rate for the space.

CeilingRAPlenum.title: CeilingRAPlenum
CeilingRAPlenum.description: Ceiling plenum used for return air or not. TRUE = Yes, FALSE = No.

BoundaryAreaHeatLoss.title: BoundaryAreaHeatLoss
BoundaryAreaHeatLoss.description: Heat loss per unit area for the boundary object. This is a design input value for use in the absence of calculated load data.
